name: Metalware
headline: Cybersecurity for firmware
description:
Metalware develops advanced firmware security solutions for real-time embedded systems, protecting critical industries like aerospace, automotive, industrial control, telecom, medical devices, and IoT from cyber threats.

Our product is an automated, intelligent binary fuzzer that enables organizations to efficiently discover and remediate security weaknesses in embedded software before release or deployment.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:hardware; industry:cybersecurity; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Ryan Chow, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO of Metalware. Previously SpaceX, JHU APL.

founders.name: Andrew Nedea, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CTO of Metalware. Previously SpaceX, Amazon Robotics, Autodesk.

# What's hiding in your firmware?
Metalware is an automated, end-to-end firmware fuzzing solution for microcontroller-based devices. Detect and remediate vulnerabilities in your safety-critical and mission-critical systems.
[Book a demo](https://www.metalware.com/</book-a-demo>)
![chip](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6668776d6f506180b9129fa1_chip.webp)
![m](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6668776c6f506180b9129f6c_m.webp)
Built by experts from
![amazon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/66687ed810f4a91d5db20e0b_Amazon_Robotics_logo.svg)
![l3harris](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/66687ed9844aa21704d0c39b_L3Harris_Technologies_logo.svg)
![space x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/66687ed82afad9786ed389d5_SpaceX-Logo%201.svg)
## **Use Cases**
![illustration firmware](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/66688b71c1e6a191beeb1510_Content.webp)
## **Use Cases**
### Offensive Security
Metalware doesn’t just scan firmware – it runs and attacks it, just like a hacker would, but in a safe controlled environment that provides actionable insights.
### Reduce Product Risk
Catch vulnerabilities during pre-release testing to safeguard your brand and avoid costly recalls or emergency patches after deployment.
### Shift Left & DevSecOps
Designed for modern development environments, Metalware integrates directly into your CI/CD pipeline—ensuring every firmware release is rigorously tested without adding overhead.
### Accelerate Compliance
Generate detailed, audit-ready reports that exceed industry standards—from aviation and automotive to medical devices. Metalware delivers clear, actionable insights to help you satisfy regulatory requirements.
## Core Platform
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/67af8fe6604ea47af42339ec_Screenshot%202025-02-14%20at%2010.47.55%20AM.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/placeholder.svg)
## **Core Platform**
### Automated Firmware Unpacking & Emulation
Full-device emulation replicates the operational environment of embedded devices, enabling realistic testing of low-level firmware behavior.
### Intelligent Fuzzing Engine
Parallelized fuzzing is horizontally and vertically scalable, delivering actionable results much faster than traditional methods.
### CI/CD Integration
Flexible APIs and connectors fit in any modern development and security ecosystem.
### Crash Detection & Analysis
Metalware provides immediate insights and reproducible test cases to accelerate remediation. Turn complex debugging into a straightforward, repeatable process.
## Security and Compliance
![ITAR](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6668931c4616a747ae2f0cb8_ITAR.webp)
### ITAR Registered
Supports critical software for aerospace & defense
![AWS](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6668931cfcfce2e9a8124302_AWS.webp)
### AWS GovCloud 
Approved for AWS GovCloud for highly sensitive government data
![soc II](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6668931cc8f991fed3e069a5_soc%20II.webp)
### AICPA SOC Type 2 
Adheres to stringent security and availability standards (certification in progress)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666869d7c1a1c583c5f12690/6786c1c56b3adc7dbbed716f_sam.png)
### SAM Registered
Recognized by the U.S. government as a federal vendor
## Discover how Metalware can protect your firmware
Schedule a demo to see our firmware vulnerability detection in action
[Book a demo](https://www.metalware.com/</book-a-demo>)

generated_description:
### Metalware: Securing the Future of Firmware

**Overview**
Metalware, founded in 2023 in San Francisco, is a cutting-edge cybersecurity company focused on safeguarding firmware. Emerging from the Y Combinator Batch S23, Metalware is designed to tackle the increasing cyber threats faced by critical industries.

**Mission**
The mission is straightforward: provide advanced cybersecurity solutions specifically for firmware in real-time embedded systems. Their aim is to protect essential sectors such as aerospace, automotive, industrial control, telecom, medical devices, and IoT from potential cyber attacks.

**Product Offering**
Metalware has developed a sophisticated, automated binary fuzzer that helps organizations identify and address security vulnerabilities in embedded software prior to its release or deployment. This proactive approach significantly reduces risks, allowing companies to release their products with confidence.

**Key Features**
- **Automated Firmware Unpacking & Emulation:** Offers a realistic testing environment that mimics the operational scenarios of embedded devices.
- **Intelligent Fuzzing Engine:** Allows for rapid, actionable results thanks to its scalable approach to vulnerability detection.
- **CI/CD Integration:** Seamlessly fits into modern development workflows, ensuring every firmware release undergoes meticulous testing without adding extra burden.
- **Crash Detection & Analysis:** Provides immediate feedback and reproducible test cases, simplifying the debugging process.

**Industries Served**
Metalware caters to a variety of sectors:
- Automotive
- Aerospace & Defense
- Consumer IoT
- Industrial Controls
- Medical Devices
- Telecom

**Team and Leadership**
With a small but mighty team of 2 employees, Metalware is led by industry veterans with experience from major players like Amazon, L3Harris, and SpaceX. Michael Seibel serves as their Group Partner, steering the company within the Y Combinator ecosystem.

**Compliance and Security Certification**
Metalware is registered as ITAR compliant, operates on AWS GovCloud for handling sensitive government data, and is in the process of obtaining AICPA SOC Type 2 compliance. 

**Getting Involved**
For those interested in exploring how Metalware can enhance firmware security, potential clients can easily book a demo through their website at [Metalware.com](https://www.metalware.com/).

In essence, Metalware isn't just about protecting firmware—it’s about paving the way for a more secure and resilient technological landscape. If you're operating in a critical industry, Metalware might just be the partner you need to stay ahead of cyber threats.
